reporting-org.narrative: Bundesministerium für wirtschaftliche Zusammenarbeit und Entwicklung (BMZ)
Federal Ministry for Economic Cooperation and Development (BMZ)

title.narrative: Ländliche sozio-ökonomische Entwicklung in Gumine, Fortführung
Rural Socio-Economic Development in Gumine District, Simbu Province, continuation.

description.narrative: Das Projekt fördert sozio-ökonomische Entwicklung der ländlichen Bevölkerung in Gumine Distrikt im zentralen Hochland von Papua-Neuguinea. Ländliche Haushalte und insbesondere Frauen und jungen Menschen werden bei Qualifizierung des Anbaus und Vermarktung von Kaffee sowie Einkommensdiversifizierung und sozio-kulturellen Aktivitäten unterstützt.

The project focuses on economic and socio-cultural empowerment of rural populations in Gumine District in the central highlands of PNG to bring about a tangible difference in the lives of people and communities. CDA will work closely with farmers, leaders, youth and women through community building, skills training, material support, leadership and cultural development.

The project focuses on economic and socio-cultural empowerment of rural populations in Gumine District in the central highlands of PNG to bring about a tangible difference in the lives of people and communities. CDA will work closely with farmers, leaders, youth and women through community building, skills training, material support, leadership and cultural development.
